Package bio.singa.mathematics.geometry.model

Interface Polygon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Polytope<Vector2D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplexPolygon, Rectangle, VertexPolygon, VoronoiCell
    public interface Polygon
extends Polytope<Vector2D>
    A polygon is the two dimensional representation of a polytope.

      • getIntersectionFragments

        default java.util.List<Polygon.IntersectionFragment> getIntersectionFragments​(LineSegment lineSegment)
        Returns the intersection and the nodes, which connecting edge was intersected.
        Parameters:
        lineSegment - The line segment.
        Returns:
        An intersection fragment containing the point of intersection as well as the start and endpoint of the edge that was intersected.
